author: Matt Patches
title: 17 new science-fiction and fantasy books to check out in April
description: A new book based on the show Firefly is just the beginning of April. New books from John Scalzi, Rysa Walker, Michael Carey, Tim Lebbon, Mark Lawrence, and Emily Skrutskie all arrive for reading during the time of coronavirus shelter-in-place home life.
content: As social-distancing and mandatory shelter-in-place orders have sprung up all around the US and rest of the world, plenty of people have worked to keep themselves entertained at home. Certainly, streaming services and games are one way, but books are just as … [+16725 chars]
